welcome.title: WELCOME TO TAPKLIK ONEAD TUTORIAL
welcome.text: This brief tutorial will guide you through the basics of uploading your first creatives and running your first campaign

creatives.title: CREATIVE FORMATS
creatives.text: Tapklik supports standard banner creative formats in JPEG, PNG, GIF and HTML5

creatives.title: CREATIVE SIZES
creatives.text: For best performance, consult with your Account Manager for ad sizes that go well for your industry and target audience. For the standard IAB ad sizes please visit: https://www.iab.com/guidelines/

creatives.title: CREATIVES APPROVALS
creatives.text: To ensure that creatives align with different regulations, all creatives undergo a pre-approval scanning. Please allow up to 24 hours for your creatives to be approved before being able to use them in your campaigns

campaigns.title: BEFORE FIRST CAMPAIGN
campaigns.text: Before starting your first campaign make sure to have a few things ready, such as creative design and conversion site or landing page

campaigns.title: ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT
campaigns.text: Allow for our Account Managers to understand your conversion targets and to walk you through your first campaign
